name: Project V.A
description:
Jam your way through all the music notes and aim for a top score! As you complete a level, you will unlock the next songs in the sequence. Rock on and Enjoy!

Make sure to play all 5 levels, ranging from Easy Difficulty all the way To Hard Difficulty!

The game is still in the pre-alpha stage.

Controls:

  • 1 - Slam note in far left lane
  • 2 - Slam note in left-middle lane
  • 3 - Slam note in the middle lane
  • 4 - Slam note in right-middle lane
  • 5 - Slam note in far right lane
